blocks.content:
## **Hey There, I'm Matthew!**

I'm the current Director of Finance, Interim Director of Academics, previous Vice President, and previous First Year Representative of the Carleton Computer Science Society. For the past three years, I've worked with the board to organize dozens of initiatives and I'd like to continue again next year as your **Director of Academics**.

## My Platform

If elected, I will organize a variety of initiatives that will improve resource accessibility, create opportunities, and help our members achieve academic success.

 1. [**Discrete Math Resources ✏️**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/discrete-math-resources)
 2. [**Industry Presentations and Info Sessions 💡**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/info-sessions)
 3. [**More Tech Talk Variety  🎉**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/tech-talks)
 4. [**A Brand New Website  💻**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/website)
 5. [**Internship & Scholarship Resources  💼**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/more-online-resources---internships-scholarships)
 6. [**Carleton CS News Feed 📡**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/carleton-cs-news-feed)
 7. [**Mentors for Side Projects 🎓**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/mentorship-for-side-projects)
 8. [**Open Source Development ⚒️**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/open-source-initiative)
 9. [**More Daily Code Challenges 🗓️**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/more-daily-code-challenges)
10. [**Continuing Dev Club 🛠️**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/dev-club)
